pages.text: TFC has a number of $(thing)commands$() that are used for debugging and creative work.

$(item)/findveins [all:<vein name>] <radius> [dump:rate]$()$(br2)Finds coordinates of veins for you. Only reads from already generated chunks. Dump writes a file with all the veins, Rate writes a file with all the veins counted.
$(item)/playertfc <get:set:add:reset> [nutrition:food:saturation:water:skill <name>]$()$(br2)Modifies attributes about the player. Some combinations (such as adding nutrition) are disabled.
$(item)/heat <amount>$()$(br2)If holding a heatable item, it will heat it to the temperature (integer) you specify.
$(item)/stripworld <radiusInBlocks>$()$(br2) Removes all stone variant blocks and water from a certain radius. Used to reveal vein structures.$(br2)$(4)WARNING!!! THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE$()
